This is the Web Fortress config file, same syntax as DF raws.

The port the server will listen on. Don't forget to forward your ports.
[PORT:1234]

The amount of time each turn lasts. if INGAME_TIME is 'YES', this is in ingame
ticks, if 'NO', then this is in IRL seconds.
[INGAME_TIME:NO]
[TURNTIME:600]

The max number of concurrent connections that the server will accept.
[MAX_CLIENTS:32]

Enable autosave while nobody is playing. You probably shouldn't use this yet.
[AUTOSAVE_WHILE_IDLE:NO]
